hero.title: Coaching services that move your next role
hero.subtitle: From fast brand upgrades to executive positioning, every package is built to increase interviews, strengthen your signal, and help you land the right offer.
hero.metaTitle: Coaching Services That Move Your Next Role | Askia
hero.metaDescription: Outcome‑focused coaching services across resume, LinkedIn, interviews, and offer strategy.

tiers.title: Resume Rebuild
tiers.body: A sharp, impact‑driven resume that signals seniority and gets recruiter replies.
tiers.ideal: Best for: quick upgrade + clearer positioning

tiers.title: Resume + LinkedIn + Cover Letter
tiers.body: A complete brand refresh across every recruiter touchpoint.

tiers.title: Brand + Career Clarity + Interview Practice
tiers.body: Everything above plus coaching to refine your narrative and interview performance.

tiers.title: Momentum Coaching (3 Sessions)
tiers.body: Three high‑leverage sessions to build strategy, momentum, and offer‑level confidence.

tiers.title: Executive Advisory
tiers.body: Senior‑level positioning, leadership narrative, and offer strategy for managers and execs.

items.question: Which service is right for me?
items.answer: If you need a fast resume upgrade, start with Resume Rebuild. If you want higher recruiter response rates across all channels, choose the full Brand refresh. If you need clarity + interview confidence, pick the Brand + Clarity package.

items.question: Do you work with senior and executive candidates?
items.answer: Yes. Executive Advisory is built for senior ICs, managers, and leaders who need a stronger leadership narrative, executive‑level positioning, and offer strategy.

items.question: How long does the process take?
items.answer: Most deliverables are completed within 7–14 days depending on package scope. Coaching timelines depend on availability, but most clients see momentum in 2–6 weeks.

items.question: Do you help with interviews and negotiation?
items.answer: Yes. Interview practice and negotiation strategy are included in the Brand + Clarity package and Momentum Coaching.

items.question: Will you tailor everything to my target roles?
items.answer: Yes. Every engagement begins with role targeting so your resume, LinkedIn, and narrative reflect the level and type of role you want next.

items.question: Do you guarantee results?
items.answer: We don’t promise outcomes we can’t control, but we do guarantee a clear, strategic plan and materials aligned to the market you’re targeting.

items.question: Can I combine services?
items.answer: Absolutely. Many clients start with Brand refresh and then add coaching when interviews begin. We can build a custom path.

cta.title: Not sure which path fits?
cta.body: Book a quick call and we’ll help you choose the best option for your goals.
